subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0245_01C9D953.0313EC00
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Yeah-try to look at it unbiased, back from ground zero and see if you get a=
 different message.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Kristin Morris=
 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 1:53 PM
  =
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.






  Good idea.  I'll see =
f I can find it and post it here to see if you hear "mom is calling"  I'll =
even dig out the You lied one too J

  k




------------------------------=
------------------------------------------------

  From: EVP-ITC@yahoogrou=
ps.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of April Abercrombie
  Se=
nt: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 2:27 PM
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  Subject=
: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.








  Yes-perfect example of aud=
ible scrying.



  What's happening is that the random audio is just a back=
ground used for you to scry into. Infact, if this is what is happening, I b=
et if you could get the "Your mom is calling" message out of your head and =
listen to that same track on another occasion, you may hear a completely di=
fferent message.



  This could also be why Frank has reported that his me=
ssages change from what he first heard.



  In essence, it isn't the physi=
cal recording sounds giving you the message, it is your subconscious mind.
=





    ----- Original Message ----- 

    From: Kristin Morris 

    To: =
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 

    Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 11:01 AM

    S=
ubject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.



    Okay I have another one=
 for you to think about.. I tape a session and review it later..  even a da=
y later.  Upon review the message that comes over is about something that '=
just happened' while I was reviewing or happened after taping?  Is it possi=
ble that spirit can manipulate the recording AFTER recording has stopped or=
 even manipulate the audio while reviewing?

    An give you an example of =
this I was recording one day and I reviewed the audio the next day.  While =
reviewing - about half way through - the message "Your mother is calling" w=
as found.  I saved it and moved on and within two seconds my mom called.  Y=
ou say it is a coincidence except that I hadn't spoken to my mother in over=
 a year.  During this same conversation with her - we sorta made amends and=
 I told her the story of the 'secret' I had found out about a family member=
 having a child out of wedlock in the late 1920s.  Quick backstory.. I foun=
d out about this out-of-wedlock birth through my genealogy research and con=
tacted spirit through the box and I was promptly told to keep it secret and=
 which I promised to do.

    Well in this conversation with my mom after n=
ot speaking for a year I told her what I had found out.  When the telephone=
 conversation ended with my mom. I was amazed that the recording had told m=
e she would call right be fore she did - even though the audio was recorded=
 the previous day.  I proceeded to go back to reviewing the audio and the v=
ery first thing I heard was:  THAT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE A SECRET - YOU LIED.
=

    Maybe they can manipulate 'real-time' literally????

    k


---------=
-------------------------------------------------------------------

    Fr=
om: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of A=
pril Abercrombie
    Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 11:36 AM
    To: EVP-ITC=
@yahoogroups.com
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.







 =
   2 different things happening-that's why. When you get EVP that everyone =
understands, it is outward, in the environment. Not a communication through=
 subconscious means.

    EVP that people swear they hear, but noone else c=
an make sense, may be a message to them via subconscious means. That isn't =
to say that ALL EVP's like this are true messages, I am sure alot are just =
matrixing.

    But then that is how the art of scrying starts-matrixing. L=
ike the Rorschach tests. The images you matrix with those gives the psychol=
ogist an insight into your mind.

    By gazing into a dark, reflective sur=
face, you start to see cloudy images. At first, you will just be matrixing =
faces in the clouds and not getting much substance. Try it, you will see wh=
at I am saying. With practice, you start to see clear, concise images.

   =
 I think that is what happening with audio as well.

    We already know fo=
r a fact pareidolia can occur in audio as well as visual stimulus.

      -=
---- Original Message ----- 

      From: Eric VanDuzer 

      To: EVP-ITC=
@yahoogroups.com 

      Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 10:19 AM

      Subj=
ect: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.

      yes I understand its perso=
nal to that particular individual but why can't I hear it.  I have gotten s=
ome very personal EVPs through the traditional investigation way (not throu=
gh a box or anything of that matter) that all others have heard.

      On =
Wed, May 20, 2009 at 12:15 PM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombieghostres=
earch.com> wrote:

      "If one person is not meant to hear it they won't =
hear it (I guess I am not quite ready to believe that one right yet)." 

  =
    I don't know for sure about that one either, but I am not ready to disc=
ount it either, especially since I stumbled across the possibility of audib=
le scrying. But I am sure alot of people don't believe in scrying at all ei=
ther.

      What makes it a possibility to me is that so many people are h=
earing things that are very personal, but stuff they would not have come up=
 with on their own.

        ----- Original Message ----- 

        From: E=
ric VanDuzer 

        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 

        Sent: Wednesda=
y, May 20, 2009 10:09 AM

        Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a quest=
ion.

        I think that is the problem I am having though Jim.  When you=
 say "work them over till you hear them"  to me I should not have to work t=
hem over till I hear them.  Yes taking out the ambient and background noise=
 is one thing.  But if you just keep on listening to them with different en=
hancements you are bound to hear something (matrixing).  If one person is n=
ot meant to hear it they won't hear it (I guess I am not quite ready to bel=
ieve that one right yet).  I think you all know what I am getting at.  

  =
      On Tue, May 19, 2009 at 9:11 PM, James W. Hyslope <clockdryve@yahoo.c=
om> wrote:

        Well, for myself...I don't "clean" them up to much beca=
use I really don't know HOW :) (well a little bit)Since I've only been at i=
t for a couple weeks. BUT if you can clean up something to where you can FI=
ND what was there to begin with "you have done no harm" I hear alot more th=
an others I guess, and I haven't enhanced many of my evp's.*If anyone is ab=
le to clean them up...I DO promise you will hear what I say is correct)Pret=
ty BOLD statement, but if you are able to clean it up with better software =
(please do for others too) I will be more than happy to "listen" where I ma=
de a mistake...I can only LEARN from it :) I have done some DEEP enhancemen=
ts to a few of my evp's...from the begining I could only hear clicks and th=
umps.....but after messing with that area, eventually I would hear the true=
 voices (and can tell if male or female...approximate age) and understand t=
he mood also....these where extreamly modified, and I feel that I could NOT=
 have added enough "simple" enhancements that would ADD a voice....full of =
emotion and distinct syllables :) And some just can't hear them for what ev=
er reason be it equipment that is used to hear (pc-headphones-speakers-ears=
) know one has the perfect match of all these things. Check out "Jim's RR-D=
R60 EVP's" in the files section....work them over till you hear them. I rea=
lly can't do much more :)--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Eric VanDuzer <eva=
nduzer@...> wrote:
        >
        > Now I may be biased to the "investig=
ation" way of doing things. I do clean
        > up evps if I hear somethin=
g and can't make it out do to ambient noise. So
        > hear is my questi=
on. When do you stop cleaning up? Wouldn't to much
        > enhancing "tai=
nt" the results? To me the more enhancing you do the less
        > convinc=
ing it becomes. I hope noone finds this offensive, it is not meant
        =
> to be I am just really curious. The way I look at it is that if you have =
to
        > do so much enhancing to find anything, was there really someth=
ing there to
        > begin with. Are we just making ourselves believe the=
re is something there??
        > 
        > Eric
        >
